column_.text_:
We chase after the red ship, straining to see through the
flurries of snow.

We chase after the red ship, straining to see through the
flurries of snow.

Leautagne Island... Home to frosty mountains, treacherous
ravines, and desolate tundra.

Leautagne Island... Home to frosty mountains, treacherous
ravines, and desolate tundra.

Out here, it's just white, white, and more white. The ship
shivers in the blasts of icy wind.

Out here, it's just white, white, and more white. The ship
shivers in the blasts of icy wind.
This place has got just one message for us: keep out.
This place has got just one message for us: keep out.
You gotta be kidding me!

Now there's a freak blizzard outta nowhere? This ship ain't
gonna survive this storm!
I'm gonna hug those cliffs! Ride's gonna get a li'l bumpy!
Bleh... This skydom is nothin' but trouble!
It's like we're cursed or something...
Rolan, a word please?

I saw a light in the distance before the storm hit. It was like the one
in Tempeal.
If that light is what I think it is...
You guessed right. It's where we'll find the island's altar... and Avia.
So they aim to drive another primal beast to insanity?

Be that as it may, Lyria is waiting for us. Now is not the time to
speculate.

Look, I know we gotta go, but the ship's hurting. We won't get far
without repairs.
And with a blizzard like this, all we can do is wait till it dies down.
I'll go on foot.
We can't wait any longer...
I'll go on foot.
I'll go on foot.

In this weather? Through a mountain? Do you know how
dangerous that is?
If anything... It might be safer.
We can't wait any longer...
We can't wait any longer...
Hmm... There may be hope yet with a crew of your talents.
Do you have a plan, Rolan?

There's an old monastery nearby. I planned to meet a friend by the
sanctum.

With her leading the way, you'll arrive at the altar come rain, sleet,
or snow.
Then she's our only chance! Come on!

The trails are infested with monsters, but after seeing your
handiwork, I'm sure we have nothing to worry about.

Oh, I'm not worried about that. Thing is, I can't leave the
Grandcypher unguarded.

Then permit me to repair her in your stead. She'll be ready to fly in
no time.
Look, it's not that I don't trust you...

Don't judge a book by its cover; I'm Mr. Fix It, remember? Repairs
are my specialty.
She's in your hands.
He might be our only chance...
She's in your hands.
She's in your hands.
Well, if 's on board with it...
He might be our only chance...
But he might be our only chance...

Look, I get it. Old gal's just been through a lot, and it's hard for me
to let go.

Look, I get it. Old gal's just been through a lot, and it's hard for me
to let go.

You're such a crybaby, Rackam. You still can't leave the
Grandcypher's nest.
Oh, gimme a break! Seriously, it ain't like that...
Rolan... Can I trust you with the Grandcypher?
Hah... On my honor, I'll do everything in my power to patch her up.

Okay, gang. Let's get going before we turn into popsicles. Lyria
needs us!

The monastery should be this way! It's a little chilly, but we'll
pull through!
Lyria hates the cold. I can't wait to have her back.

Wait here, old gal. We'll be back right after our rescue
mission.
Hang in there, Lyria. We're coming for you.

Hey. If we don't get crackin' soon, my buns are gonna freeze
in place.

Who'd want to meet in a place like this? Consider me
intrigued.
There's a blizzard coming. Stay close, everyone.
Press forth, even if nature herself would deter us.

Whatever happens, don't overdo it, okay? It won't help Lyria
if one of us collapses in the snow.

If the chill begins to bite, draw closer. My flame will warm
you.

The cold will dull your senses. Take that into account before
we fight.

A perilous, icey march does not phase me! I was trained in
such harsh environs!

Look at all this here fresh powder. Takes me back to my time
in North Vast, it does.
Rush not down the frozen path, lest you lose your footing.

Frost stills the rushing river and withers the mighty oak.
Winter is the mightiest foe!

Think warm thoughts... Like giving Lyria a big hug after we
rescue her.
Fall in behind me. I can at least mitigate some of the wind.

This chill will interfere with my alchemy... Guess I should
analyze the conditions and adjust accordingly.
I'll take point.

It's way too cold to stick around here! We're gonna freeze if
we don't move!
Hey, you think we could get a move on?

Slip off a cliff like that, and it's all over. Watch your step,
okay?
Visibility is almost zero in this snow...
Stay close. I don't want to lose anyone else.
Get a load of this frozen clump. Think you can smash it?
There's ice blocking this way too...

If you don't crush that ice clod, you're gonna become one
yourself.
Ready to get this show on the road? Then bust that ice block!
It's coming down! Watch out!
Phew, that was too close for comfort.
You still with us, buddy?!
I think I see lights!
Good! I'd wager that's where you need to go!
Aren't we heading to the monastery? We better hurry!

You don't want frostbite, do ya? Point your toes at the
monastery while you still have 'em!
Gah, skeletons! Frozen skeletons!

Jolliest pack of snowskulls I've ever seen. Don't let 'em
surround us!
Oh no! We've got a biter over here! Get it off!
It's clinging onto us! Somebody help!

Think before smashing those ice pillars. All that weight could
crush you!
Using the environment and your noggin! Nice!
Woot! Snow more monsters!

What kind of dum-dum wants to meet in a blizzard? Can we
even trust this person?
We have little choice. Come, we mustn't keep them waiting.
It's practically a whiteout! Move slowly!
Yikes! More boneheads!
That road's all lit up. Let's try following it.

Use those lights as a guide, or we're gonna be going around
in circles.
Agh! Night of the living snowcones!
How long were they hiding in there?
Look, it's the monastery!
Wow, that was quick. Way to go, mountaineers!
Come on! We ain't stoppin' to make snow angels!
Almost there! Just cross that bridge!

Good day, travelers. Although I bear no grudge against any
of you...
It would certainly behoove you to... abandon your quest.
I do beg your pardon.
My lady... You were strictly ordered not to kill them...

They went toe to toe with Gallanza and survived. This will
merely slow them down a bit.
But do keep a close eye on them.

Now then. The mountain considers your party to be uninvited
guests.
One wonders if Mother Nature will forgive this intrusion...
Hey. Still alive?
That's it. I've had it up to here with gravity.
Stop. Nobody move.
Eww... This thing grosses me out. Don't let it eat you!
If it won't let us pass, then we're left with no choice.
Eyeball-looking sonuva gun... Trying to ambush us...

Guess its monster mom never taught it any manners. Time
for a quick etiquette lesson!
Y'know, something tells me this peeper ain't one for curtsies.
Apologies for intruding. If you back down, we'll go peacefully.

Feels like it's trying to cast a spell on us... Don't stare into its
eye!

This is a tight space for a fight. Those icicles on the ceiling
don't bode well either...
Hoooo my heart, that was terrifying... But duty calls!
Look well, for my fire shall be the last light you will ever see.

The eye is a weak point for humans. I wonder if the same
holds true for you.

Dare you look down upon me and my ilk?! Then you shall
know the wrath of the holy knights!

Hm. Uses its eye for attacks, eh? What if I poke it real hard?
Problem solved!

Even with so great an eye, you cannot discern right from
wrong...

My fists guide me; your eye guides you. Hah, the perfect
contest!

Yeugh, it's gonna be gross poking that eye out... But duty
calls!

Apologies for trespassing on your turf. Not that you
would've let us pass anyway.
Hmm... What peculiar adaptations. I love a rare specimen.
I'll take care of it.
Rolan, you copy?

Those Avia jokesters intercepted us. Now we're at the
bottom of some valley, fighting for our lives.
Huh? It stopped working.
My guess is, signal doesn't stretch all the way down here.
Then we're on our own for this one. Buckle up.
Look out!
Eep, the icicles! Run for it!
Talk to me, pal!
Oh man, can you stand?
Hah-hah! Show it who's boss!
Got 'em right where you want 'em!
Mini eyeballs! Don't let them surround you!
Puny peepers incoming!
Grr, again? Stand strong!
Hasta la vista, eyebabies!
That takes care of the small fr-eye!
Head's up! It's creating a big ice block!
It's down! Get in there!
Here's our chance! Give it heck!
It's charging at us!
Steady! Here it comes!
Don't get caught!
It's going to attack!
Uh-oh! You better focus on evasion!
Here comes the big one!
I've had enough of this! Time to put it down!
Our assault is working!
You're doing great, pal! Not much longer!
Shame we couldn't see eye-to-eye. Ah well. R-eye-P, buddy.
That's it. No more puns this entire trip.
We gotta find a way up. Let's look around a little further in.
Hey, pal! We can't stick around here forever.

I've been thinking, what does the Church of Avia want with
Lyria anyway?
Their leader, Lilith, said her goal was to reach Estalucia.

She must have caught on to Lyria's unique—and
valuable—abilities.
Whatever the reason, those tyrants abducted her.
I won't let them off lightly.

Agreed. But if we're gonna make 'em pay, we gotta climb
first.
Hold on, Lyria. We're coming.

That's some cliff. Anyone else get the urge to spit, see how
far down it goes?

Why don't you lean over and let it rip? Promise I won't push
you.
Hah-hah, good joke. You wouldn't dare... Right?
Heh-heh-heh... Care to find out?
Oh great... Even more ice...

Keep your eyes open. Monsters could be hiding beneath the
snow.
This way should take us to the surface!
Come on! Path back there probably leads to freedom!
Achoo! Can we hurry up, please?

The chill puts hair on your chest, don't it? Reminds me of my
fishing trip to North Vast.

Oh, right. You went up there to catch some crabs, yeah? You
get a good haul?
Sure did! Some of the best crab legs I've ever had...
The monastery's in sight, you guys!
Hey, you tired? The monastery's right there!

Whatever's got you distracted, the monastery's more
important.
Looks like no one's home.
Did they need a door this big?
Why don't you try some open-sesame?
Sure you don't wanna check out the door?
Wait... What's that sound?
Grr, did they follow us here?

With the blizzard picking up outside, we have no choice but to
fight them off.
How many are there?! You cut one down and two pop up!
If they keep coming like this, it's gonna get real ugly.
The blizzard's too strong! We can't escape!
That snow's gonna swallow you up. Better chance it in here!
Whose magic is this?
Don't look at me...
I've been waiting, traveling skyfarers.
I am Historiath, overseer of Mellose Monastery.
Thank you for your assistance. You must be Rolan's acquaintance.
Indeed I am.

Did anyone from the Church of Avia come this way? Maybe a flashy
red ship?

Yes, and they've already disturbed the altar ahead. The primeval
god it honors is most displeased.
Then there really is a primal beast here as well.

The god's anger manifests as a blistering white storm. I seek to
quell its rage.

Well, we're after those jerks that caused it. Maybe we could go
together?
The road forward is a sacred one; sealed to all but me.
However, it is no place for outsiders.

Lyria's our friend. She means a lot to us! Please, let us come with
you!
Hmm...
You've got to help us!
We'll find a way with or without you.
You've got to help us!
You've got to help us!
Oh? Do I now? At least you aren't lacking in bravado.
We'll find a way with or without you.
We'll find a way with or without you.

You exhibit great courage despite your youth. Rolan was right to
trust you.

Yes. That fire in your eyes speaks of great tenacity, an
unquenchable resolve.
Very well. Do as you like.
Yes! Thank you!

But be warned: sacred grounds are not immune to the taint of
malice. Do keep up.
We won't hold you back. Lead the way.
O primeval god of Felfrost's dominion...
Bestow thy grace and guide us past the door of seclusion.
It is done. Come.
Let us be off.
What are you waiting for?
Whoa... What amazing mana reserves...

I'm no stranger to ice-based spells, but this is something
else entirely.

Ahead lies the Tredame Sanctum, wherein a primeval god
resides.
Took us forever and a half, but we made it!
Don't stop right in front of the finish line!
Tredame Sanctuary is coming up. You ready to do this?
Another door blocks our path...
Allow me.
O primeval god of Felfrost's dominion...
Bestow thy grace and guide us past the door of seclusion.

Found the welcome squad. Dunno how they're kicking when
it's sub-zero.
If my incantation is interrupted, the sigils will cease forming.

It demands my fullest attention. Can you keep the rabble
occupied?
Understood. We'll protect you while you work your magic.
Historiath's a regular monster magnet, ain't she?
Perhaps they find her intense magical capacity alluring?

All the more reason to stay focused! Come what may, we
stand guard!
Yeah!
Historiath's taking the heat! Go help her!

Gah! The monsters interrupted Historiath's spell! We gotta
back her up!
Historiath's in trouble! Go bust those baddies!
Ngh, could you defend me?
Historiath had to stop casting! We gotta do better, bud!
Those jerks are attacking her again!
Historiath's been hit! Do something quick!
Ahh... Once more.

That's a water spirit... Did it crystallize to survive this
climate?

New baddies! Don't let these chumpolas get the better of
you!
Backups! Knock 'em flying!
Historiath's going to bat for us! We gotta do our part too!

Hold it! If I didn't know you, pal, I'd say you were running
away!
Whoa! We ain't going nowhere without Historiath!
In the name of Mellose...
Heed these ancient words.
I shall commence.
Lift the shackles of seclusion.
Guide us through the door.
Hnnnh!
Just a bit longer! Keep me protected!
Almost ready.
Nice work! Let's move!

Apologies for my earlier incivility. Your skill is
unquestionable.
Hehe. Wait till you see me get serious!
I expect to be impressed.
Make haste for the next door.
Why do you dally? Your friend needs you.
The drive to save a loved one never ceases to amaze me.
Hm?
Tis nothing.
The blizzard stopped...
An ill omen. We must hurry.
That's one sturdy lookin' door.
But no match for me.
We got incoming!
Yikes! They're aiming for Historiath!
Oh no! Historiath's under fire! Step in!

Those long-ranged goons are attacking our guide! Go get
'em!
Here comes more from the bridge!
They're coming from the sides!
Hey, teeny's here and lookin' for action!
Keep your eyes on that one. It's deadlier than the rest.
Protect Historiath!
No fair! It called its buddies!
Crying for help, ya big weenie?
Grr, all these runts... Clean 'em up!
That's it! Show ol' Frosty Bones who's boss!
Awesome! The bigger they are, the harder they fall.
Now it's just the small fry. Don't let 'em get to Historiath!
The circle is on the verge of completion.
It is time.
Begone, foul spawn!
Phew, glad that's over.
It would be a shame to stop now.
Tredame Sanctum beckons.
At long last...
It is far too quiet for my liking.
The altar lies ahead.
Huh? Isn't that Lyria?
Heeey!
Lyria!
Can she hear us? Hey! Lyri—
Lyria?
What's this... Lyria...
Stop!
Another foe?
Historiath!
You knave... What did you do to Lyria?
Answer!
I wouldn't interfere if I were you.
Protect us.
Lyria is staying with us.
This ain't funny! Snap out of it, Lyria!

You won't defeat us so easily again. By my blade, we will see
Lyria returned!

You may have beat us to a pulp last time, but your luck's run
dry.
Lyria, I know you're in there... Talk to us!

When the goin' gets tough, skyfarers get goin'. You're in for
a world of pain.
Care to tell my thorns what you've done to Lyria?
This is it... The battle for Lyria. Get ready to go all out.
If you will not return Lyria, we shall take her by force!
Hang in there, Lyria... We'll get you back!

Lay a hand upon my vassal again, and you beckon the wrath
of a king.

We'll learn your reasons for abducting Lyria. At sword point,
if need be.
You fiendish miscreant! You will answer for your crimes!

My eyes ain't what they used to be, but Lyria looks
possessed! Dang flimflammy hocus-pocus!
If I find you've hurt her, you won't live to regret it...
Liberation shall win this day! Hraaaagh!
The hell did you do to our Lyria! Hey! I'm talking to you!

What have you done to Lyria! If you've so much as harmed a
hair on her head...

I found Lyria first! And I do not take kindly to the kidnapping
of my subjects!
How is this happening?
Warmth of the earth, embrace us.

What's the big idea, Lyria?! Why are you siding with that
dorkus?!
Come clean. Why did you kidnap Lyria?
Oh, now he's got nothing to say.

I don't like it, but we have ways of making him talk! You will
pay dearly!
Does this guy eat steel for breakfast? He's strong as hell!

First Gallanza, now this dude. Where does Avia find these
monsters?

His name is Id... One of Avia's top three... Said to be this
skydom's strongest...

No wonder he's so tough. But why would a man of his
ferocity obey the church?

He may be Lilith's... son. Details escape me, but it would
explain much.

The big cheese's little cheese, huh? Supportin' Mom is great
an' all, but think for yourself, man!
Lyria isn't acting like herself either. We must get to her!
This guy is too good. Can't get a clean hit on him!
Time's up.
That's not possible!
Try all you like!
It won't work.
He dodged that!?
Hmph. Not bad.
Do it, Lyria.
Yes.
Sprint forth.
Wolf of icy mist, Managarmr.
Come back here!
I shall thaw this storm!
Historiath, you aren't hurt, are you?
Worry not, young one. Now it is I who shall support you.

Surging spring of aster's bloom, by Mellose's seal, I bind
thee!
It worked!

Should the primeval god remain unquelled, the sun will never
kiss these skies again.
All my magic shall be with you.
Thanks, Historiath. We can take it from here.
We didn't come this far to lose Lyria now... Beat this sucker!
Time is of the essence. We make our offensive hard and fast.
Not gonna let us waltz on by, is it? Then we'll go through it!
Come on, everyone! Lyria's freedom is on the line!

Frozen tundras, snow wolves... I think I've had enough
sightseeing in this skydom.

We're facing a force as great as Furycane. One wrong move,
and it could be your last.

I've got so many questions about Lyria. But first, this pup
needs to learn obedience!

Wolves will hunt their prey to the end of the skies. We must
fell the beast here.

Now that the blizzard's stopped, there's nothing holding me
back! Let's do this!
Move aside, or be hewn where you stand!
Lyria's trail is fading... We must win this battle, and quickly!

Compared to the enormity of my respect for Lyria, physical
size means nothing!

A misty wolf, eh? Quite the pesky foe! Let's melt them down,
shall we?
Like ice beneath the sun's rays, your life will melt away.

The road to glory is paved with tribulation! You will become a
fine brick on my path!

With the snow out of my face, I can get back to doing what I
do best: hunting primals!
I'm worried about Lyria, but stopping this beast comes first.
Avia is after these primal beasts... But for what?
This won't take long.
It's zipping around like lightning! I can't get crosshairs on it!

Follow its movement! That horn'll skewer you like a pig on a
spit!

With its ice armor gone, it's a lot faster! Careful you don't
lose track of it!
Speed won't save you again. I'm used to your games now.

Back to your speedy form, huh? Too bad you can't outrun my
magic!
Watch out!
Aw crap! Get outta the way!
It's charging up! Focus on dodging!
Uh-oh! Get ready!
Gah! Where'd it go?!

It's moving too fast for the eye to follow. Stay calm. Learn its
pattern of attack.
There it goes bouncing all over the place!
It's getting ready to strike. Stay focused.
Step lively, guys! Don't give flurrypaws an easy target!
Focus! Anticipate its movements and evade accordingly!
Grr, looks like it's bulked up!
Ice armor? Simple, but effective.
Back to the ice armor! This is one tough sucker!

It's armored itself again... One fell blow, and it could crush
any of us.
Yep, big fella like that, best not to take it head on.
By the gods... A storm brews!
Don't let that wind catch you in the open!
Freezing winds! Take cover!
Ice storm! Every dragon for himself!
The ice formations... Perhaps they hold the key to survival!

The storm can freeze you in your tracks. Exploit your
surroundings.
It's hurling ice! Hit the deck!
More ice bombs! Look out!
This hail's super annoying... But I have just the spell!
Back away! Those ice shards are dangerous!
The less obstacles there are, the less cover we have.

If we lose any more ice blocks, we're gonna face the storm's
full blast!
Retain some ice pillars to protect against the storm!
Its mana is spiking! A massive ice storm is imminent!
Brace yourselves for the next surge of power!
You must seek cover, lest the coming storm seal your doom.
It's smashing our cover! Rude!
Gah! Not good!
There goes our storm wall!
Those ice spikes are a real pain in the tail! Can you bust 'em?
We're getting nowhere. Bring down the projectiles first.
Stop its assault—destroy those frozen fangs.
Heads up! More flyin' icicles!
Again with the darts? Fine, I like a bit of target practice!

Ugh, I've shot down so many of these spikes. Just give up
already!
Hurry, break more!
There's too many...
Keep fighting. You are not clear of danger.
You got this, pal! Get those icicles!
The last hurdle before the finish line, huh? I'm down to race!
O primeval god, I beg your forgiveness.
What the heck are those little things?
Looks like a ranged attack... A final ace up its gauntlet.
Here it comes again!
Trying to wear us out, huh? Not gonna work!
It's hurting! Pedal to the metal, people!

We've gotta be getting close now! Eyes on the prize,
everybody!
The god's magic is wavering. Soon it will be over.
Here it comes!
Gah! I think we made it mad!
The temperature dropped... Careful when you approach!
Look at it whimper! Showtime!
An opening! Get in there!
It's not moving! Let's get 'im!
Hello? Is anyone there!
It's only temporary, but I fixed up the ship to get her flying again!
Oh... Goodie...
You don't sound very happy... Did something happen?
Lyria... She...
Avia got away...
Lyria... She...
Lyria... She...
Avia got away...
Avia got away...
Hang in there. I'll come grab you guys ASAP.
That's a bitter pill to swallow...
It was a pitiful outcome, despite my presence.

No, even I assumed they wouldn't control primal... I mean, the
primeval gods.
And there's the matter of Lyria's odd behavior....

Her eyes were empty, as if her soul were caged. What's more, the
blue choker she wore did not sit right with me.
A blue choker? Like a collar around her neck? Could it be?
"Could it be" what, Rolan? Is it a clue?
Uh, possibly... Just a story I heard a while back.

If rumors are to be believed, the Church of Avia has been toying
with a forbidden implement.
A what now?

The "mind sealer." A tool that blinds one's will, leaving them open
to manipulation.

Given its inhumane nature, the use of such an artifact was
supposedly banned.

If those buttheads are using something like that, then they're
worse than trash!
Hm...
Couldn't we just smash the cursed thing to pieces?

I don't advise using force to break it. That would put Lyria's life in
danger.
Bah... I figured it wouldn't be that easy...
What about nullifying its influence?

I have a connection in Seedhollow who knows his curios. I bet he
could tell us more.

You intend to ask the Family Zathba? Informants don't cooperate
without a price.
Hey, deep down he's got a heart of gold! It'll work out!
Wishful thinking...
Thanks again, Rolan. We'd be up the creek without you.

Always glad to help. Remember, when Mr. Fix It's on the case,
nothing is impossible!

Got that right. Fixin' our airship while it's stuck on a freezing
mountain? Wow.

Alas, I merely applied bandages. What she really needs is servicing
in Seedhollow.
And on that note, I say we take to the skies. I'll show you the way.

I'm as worried about Lyria as anyone, but this ship needs a
serious tune-up.
We'd better get goin'. We have to find a way to help Lyria.

We finally caught up to Lyria, but her eyes had lost their
spark. When I called her name, she didn't respond.

We finally caught up to Lyria, but her eyes had lost their
spark. When I called her name, she didn't respond.

She didn't hear me. The Lyria we know and love? It's like she
wasn't in there anymore.

She didn't hear me. The Lyria we know and love? It's like she
wasn't in there anymore.

What is Avia plotting? With so many mysteries left unsolved,
I get the feeling this is just the beginning.

What is Avia plotting? With so many mysteries left unsolved,
I get the feeling this is just the beginning.

But for now, we need to dig up info on this mind sealer thing.
We flew through the night without ever stopping.

But for now, we need to dig up info on this mind sealer thing.
We flew through the night without ever stopping.
I can see our next island, hugged by dawn's warming light.
Call that amber glow false hope, but I'll take it.
I can see our next island, hugged by dawn's warming light.
Call that amber glow false hope, but I'll take it.
